title: Shades of Green with Busy Philipps
itunes:title: Shades of Green with Busy Philipps
description:
Actor, author, activist, writer and producer Busy Philipps is gracing us with her cart this week. Like the queen she is, Busy loves to support small businesses – but the pandemic has made it really hard. Despite that and adjusting to NYC shopping, Busy has a cart that will have you rushing to click “buy.”

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

  • The Clare V. Moyen messenger bag is perfect for storing everyday necessities, like crystals and weed pens
  • The gem of Busy’s cart is hands down this Bissell Little Green Portable Carpet Cleaner
  • Busy is rocking this TopShop Long Brushed Coat on the streets of NYC
  • Loved Busy and her cart? Check out her podcast at @bpisdoingherbest

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
